title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Site Closures  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Site Closures  The Acadian Cultural Center is closed Friday-Saturday, August 12-13, due to area flooding. The French Quarter Visitor Center is closed through Wednesday, August 24, for repairs but rangers are on duty in the theater room off the visitor center courtyard. more
